alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 02 at 10:25PM EDT until July 03 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 436 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST OHIO ATHENS MEIGS MORGAN WASHINGTON IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST VIRGINIA BUCHANAN DICKENSON IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 24 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL WEST VIRGINIA BRAXTON CALHOUN CLAY GILMER JACKSON NICHOLAS ROANE IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA DODDRIDGE PLEASANTS RITCHIE TYLER WIRT WOOD IN SOUTHERN WEST VIRGINIA BOONE FAYETTE KANAWHA LINCOLN LOGAN MCDOWELL MINGO PUTNAM RALEIGH WYOMING IN WESTERN WEST VIRGINIA MASON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALUM CREEK, ATHENS, BECKLEY, BELMONT, BELPRE, BURNSVILLE, CHAPMANVILLE, CHARLESTON, CLAY, CLINTWOOD, CRAIGSVILLE, ELIZABETH, FAYETTEVILLE, GARY, GASSAWAY, GLENVILLE, GRANTSVILLE, GRUNDY, HAMLIN, HARRISVILLE, HARTS, HURRICANE, LOGAN, MADISON, MAN, MARIETTA, MCCONNELSVILLE, MIDDLEBOURNE, MULLENS, NEW HAVEN, OAK HILL, OCEANA, PADEN CITY, PARKERSBURG, PENNSBORO, PINEVILLE, POINT PLEASANT, POMEROY, RAVENSWOOD, RICHWOOD, RIPLEY, SAINT ALBANS, SISTERSVILLE, SOUTH CHARLESTON, SPENCER, ST. MARYS, STOCKPORT, SUMMERSVILLE, SUTTON, TEAYS VALLEY, VANSANT, VIENNA, WAR, WELCH, WEST UNION, AND WILLIAMSON.
